title: No help when one of their shops was a scam
text: Ordered an item from one of the shops in the shop app. They took the amount due from my credit card. I received an email they had my order and would ship within 7-9 business days. 3 weeks later no word from them. I clicked on the link to their website, a message said something went wrong. I tried going online to get to their website, there wasn‚Äôt one, I called the phone number in their info, it‚Äôs not a working number. I sent an email; which came up as something entirely different than the business name. Never heard back. I opened a ticket with shop. The response I received was, I should contact the retailer, go to their web sight & look for ‚Äúcontact us‚Äù. The letter told me to do everything i had already done & had told them I had. Lastly I should contact my bank. As a side note, they mentioned a new feature on their app & had I tried it yet? It‚Äôs frustrating when you trust an app, get ripped off, & they don‚Äôt really care. At the very least, if they are selling third party products, those retailers should be vetted. I don‚Äôt think this app does what it claims and I certainly don‚Äôt feel safe buying anything from their app. Useless service.

title: SCAM
text:
THIS APP IS A SCAM
If I could give zero stars I would. I have been dealing with a refund for over a month now. SHOP makes it hard to impossible to communicate with them. Once you finally get through (electronically only) they take days to respond ONLY to send you through loop after loop. 
I explained thoroughly that I placed an order and paid in full  (one transaction) ON THEIR APP, to Cup Heaven who sell Stanley cups. I never received the cup and have yet to hear from Cup Heaven  (the company SHOP) allowed on their network to sell products. All of the contact information for the Cup Heaven is invalid. I reported them several times, written several emails and everything except call the president, yet SHOP has don‚Äôt absolutely nothing to assist. I did receive an email directing me to contact the seller (Cup Heaven) even though I stated all throughout my email that I have tried to contact Cup Heaven with no success that‚Äôs why I was reaching out to SHOP. Nonetheless, SHOP is supposed to ‚Äútrack‚Äù my purchase plus I submitted my order number and yet they still did absolutely nothing. At this point I believe that BOTH companies are a scam. I have no product, my money was taken, and no one being accountable for this. They are going to push us back to in store purchases only in this household. And of course I will tell everyone that I can about this horrible experience.

title: No customer service
text:
I purchased a stationary bike trainer from a distributor on Shop. The distributor disappeared from the platform shortly after they took my money. When I tried to contact Shop for a refund they directed me back to this distributor but the phone numbers and e- mail they provided never responded. I never received my purchased item, could not contact anyone about it and lost 300 dollars. I‚Äôve tried numerous times to resolve it but get no response from Shop or the vendor on their sight.  
Do not trust or use Shop. 
Mark
